mapper.select: SELECT ID , hd.`YEAR` as year , hd.TYPE_CD as typeCd , hd.HOLIDAY_DATE as holidayDate , hd.HOLIDAY_NAME as holidayName , hd.REMARK as remark , hd.CREATED_DATE as createdDate , hd.CREATED_BY as createdBy , hd.UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate , hd.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy FROM tb_holiday_info hd where hd.`YEAR` =#{year}
